name: Hamlet Bucksby: The Fourth Little Pig
name_original: Hamlet Bucksby: The Fourth Little Pig
description:
You are the fourth little pig!

Use the power of money to fend off the wolves!

Roll your way to victory, in this sack-rolling adventure!

Made for GMTK-Jam, 2017.

Credits:
Matt Woelk - Programming
Daniel Bergman - Music and Audio
Steve Chubaty - Art

v1.0.1 contains a bug fix (just after 48 hour limit) that fixes the incredible framerate-dependent speed that was happening on some machines.
